name: Maze Dungeon - Let's go to the 99 floor!
name_original: Maze Dungeon - Let's go to the 99 floor!
description:
Let's find the treasure of the legendary sleeping in 99 basement!
You try to conquer the complex dungeon that does not even live monsters!
This is a comical world of maze game.

[Overview]
You to capture the intense James maze dungeon that does not even live monster by the king of instruction.
And get the treasure of the legendary sleeping in 99 basement!

[How to play]
  - It is possible to operate a hero by sliding the screen.
  - Under the stairs is the goal. Let's aim at the goal!
 
[Material provided]
This game lets me use the material of the following sites.
